replies.body: First
*Throws blue shell*
Best comment I've seen on these boards.
Nice
Now we just need to know what Senna can actually do ingame..

Listening to the 'ability effort' audio files makes it seem like she can heal, take damage for an ally or something like that, do something when she dies, and it sounds like her ultimate is that light-blast-shield thing we saw in the cinematic
i would like to see another aggressive support like pike or lux
she should have obvious synergy with lucian aswell
*FURIOUSLY WAITS FOR SENNA'S ABILITIES*

Was going to say the same thing, we have to wait until October 29 so that we can play her on the PBE but I would really want to see what her kit is in anticipation of her release (plus today is my birthday so it would make my day if we saw a preview of her kit).
Happy B Day
Thank you!

Happy Birthday!! 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Happy B-day! This is a day you and everyone else in LoL had been waiting for!
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Happy Birthday DC {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Happy Birthday DC. Maybe if we all keep spamming HBD, a rioter will notice and grant DC his/her birthday wish lol
Happy B-Day! {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Happy Birthday!!
{{summoner:50}} happy B-day{{summoner:50}}
Happy birthday!

I think it's awesome you are providing a 3D model for us to use.

Maybe in the future we can get more? If not all weapons as 3D models? People would even pay a small fee to get them, I know I would. We can already find alot of league models out there, some are free some cost, but none of them are THE models.

Honestly wouldnt take much work to start adding them to the Merc store.

So its not always easy due to the quality in game. For this case, we made a video with high res models already. Therefore giving out the gun file was much easier. The detailed 3D file already existed. Characters that don't have that, the 3D files aren't always as detailed since they are meant to be in league and seen from a particular angle. It super exciting that we were able to do it for this project, and personally I hope we can do it more!
Awesome! Hopefully you guys can do more! And Like i said people would be willing to pay for them, specially if they are high quality!

I'd love to 3D print a model of Senna's gun, but unfortunately the file in the zip is a .ztl file, so only people with a commercial version of zbrush can convert it to an .stl or .obj file for printing. Would it be possible to have an .stl file or .obj file in the zip so people without zbrush can print it? Thanks again for the model

I think there is a mistake in the links.

The first one is stills from the cinematic trailer, which were supposed to be in the last one, and the turnarounds are nowhere.
working on fixing ASAP!
Thanks! I'm really looking forward to the turnarounds, I have a ton of ideas for fanart
Should be fixed. Check it now
is the zip file for the SennaGun file being fixed? No matter what browser or computer I try to download it, Windows gives an error in trying to open or extract it.
Well, I don't need them, don't stress out for me. Just pointing that out for you ;-)
Thank you Rito for the art refs so I don't have to squint at the fuzzy YouTube video. <3
xayah and rakan vs lucian and senna

I just hope she screws over Pyke in-line somehow!!

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Pyke is getting a health regen nerf anyhow so he won't have as much sustain. still slippery, just not for as long :)
and dont forget about the lethality item changes for next season hes probably just gonna roll over dead

I honestly hope his ult gets some nerfs and his aoe damage on abilities gets reverted. Polymorphing Pyke as he ults you feels like trash when it still kills you (and there's a little balloon animal dancing on your corpse). HOPEFULLY something is done about those annoying interactions. I liked the AOE on his basic abilities.
I'm getting Jhin PTSD. it took them forever to reveal him after all of his teasers.
Seems the 3D zip file is an invalid zip.  Have attempted a few times.  Always unsuccessful {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Attempting to open the .zip of Senna's railgun ends up saying it's invalid. Tried redownloading with the same result.
Same here, must be on their end then.
Same here
her voice ♥
will she be a supp only or can she adc ??
Rioters said she would be a viable ADC
You can tell Riot had fun making Senna they even released the 3d printable model for her gun Poggers. Happy 10 years boys and girls, we finally got Senna back :D
The music pack only appears to have sheet music in it? No actual audio files.
Therei s nothing in that file except Senna's splash. Where are my high rez Lucian and cinematic pics?
I've been waiting a long time for a champ like Senna <3
